function-help-entry.name: quit
function-help-entry.title: Quit RevBayes

description.p: Terminates the currently running instance of RevBayes.

details.p: Quits RevBayes. All the current variables in the workspace will be lost.

function-help-entry.example: # if you really want to quit q() # you can always start again later ...
function-help-entry.author: Sebastian Hoehna
